description:
Vitaly is a cute twink that sent his jerk-off video filmed 'vertical'. This used to bug me because most screens are of course horizontal. But over the year I have gotten used to it, even seeing video on news channels, events captured with phone, and of course was held up like a phone, not a camera.
It's now settled in my brain as a "style" of video. I have some shots I want to do, and may integrate it into some vids. It does allow you to get someone from toe to head!
title: Vitaly - peep
